name: awesome-cordova-library
description: Awesome library to help to use Cordova

scripts.build: npm run --prefix ./device build && npm run --prefix ./localstorage build && npm run --prefix ./nativeaudio build && npm run --prefix ./screen-orientation build && npm run --prefix ./social-sharing build && npm run --prefix ./splashscreen build && npm run --prefix ./statusbar build && npm run --prefix ./vibration build && npm run --prefix ./globalization build && npm run --prefix ./inappbrowser build && npm run --prefix ./dialogs build && npm run --prefix ./ratedialog build && npm run --prefix ./batterystatus build && npm run --prefix ./camera build && npm run --prefix ./network-information build && npm run --prefix ./geolocation build && npm run --prefix onesignal build && npm run --prefix ./navigationbar build
scripts.install: npm --prefix ./device install && npm --prefix ./localstorage install && npm --prefix ./nativeaudio install && npm --prefix ./screen-orientation install && npm --prefix ./social-sharing install && npm --prefix ./splashscreen install && npm --prefix ./statusbar install && npm --prefix ./vibration install && npm --prefix ./globalization install && npm --prefix ./inappbrowser install && npm --prefix ./dialogs install && npm --prefix ./ratedialog install && npm --prefix ./batterystatus install && npm --prefix ./camera install && npm --prefix ./network-information install && npm --prefix ./geolocation install && npm --prefix onesignal install && npm --prefix ./navigationbar install
scripts.test: npm run --prefix ./device test && npm run --prefix ./localstorage test && npm run --prefix ./nativeaudio test && npm run --prefix ./screen-orientation test && npm run --prefix ./social-sharing test && npm run --prefix ./splashscreen test && npm run --prefix ./statusbar test && npm run --prefix ./vibration test && npm run --prefix ./globalization test && npm run --prefix ./inappbrowser test && npm run --prefix ./dialogs test && npm run --prefix ./batterystatus test && npm run --prefix ./camera test && npm run --prefix ./network-information test && npm run --prefix ./geolocation test && npm run --prefix ./navigationbar test
scripts.lint: npm run  --prefix ./device device && npm run --prefix ./localstorage lint && npm run --prefix ./nativeaudio lint && npm run --prefix ./screen-orientation lint && npm run --prefix ./social-sharing lint && npm run --prefix ./splashscreen lint && npm run --prefix ./statusbar lint && npm run --prefix ./vibration lint && npm run --prefix ./globalization lint && npm run --prefix ./inappbrowser lint && npm run --prefix ./dialogs lint && npm run --prefix ./ratedialog lint && npm run --prefix ./batterystatus lint && npm run --prefix ./camera lint && npm run --prefix ./network-information lint && npm run --prefix ./geolocation lint && npm run --prefix onesignal lint && npm run --prefix ./navigationbar lint

author: AZOULAY Jordan <jazoulay@joazco.com>
